description:
Data was generated from file metadata information from the GDC legacy archive release 13, October 2018. 
More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#data-release-130

fields.description: Referring to the default/main database at the GDC. In this table, this field is always legacy.
fields.name: dbName

fields.description: GDC file identifier. This is a duplicate of file_gdc_id field found in some tables.
fields.name: file_id

fields.description: Data accessibility policy (open or controlled)
fields.name: access

fields.description: Access Control List -- if access is controlled, this field contains the dbGaP accession, eg phs000179
fields.name: acl

fields.description: GDC archive UUID
fields.name: archive__archive_id

fields.description: Archive revision number
fields.name: archive__revision

fields.description: Archive state
fields.name: archive__state

fields.description: Original archive submitter name, eg  nationwidechildrens.org_BRCA.bio.Level_1.56
fields.name: archive__submitter_id

fields.description: Associated entity case UUID
fields.name: associated_entities__case_id

fields.description: Associated entity UUID
fields.name: associated_entities__entity_id

fields.description: Submitter id for associated entity(ies)
fields.name: associated_entities__entity_submitter_id

fields.description: Associated entity type, eg   aliquot   or   case
fields.name: associated_entities__entity_type

fields.description: Associated case UUID
fields.name: cases__case_id

fields.description: Project dbGaP accession number
fields.name: cases__project__dbgap_accession_number

fields.description: Project Disease Type
fields.name: cases__project__disease_type

fields.description: Study name of the project
fields.name: cases__project__name

fields.description: DbGaP accession number for the program
fields.name: cases__project__program__dbgap_accession_number

fields.description: Program Name
fields.name: cases__project__program__name

fields.description: Program Short Name with Project Short Name
fields.name: cases__project__project_id

fields.description: Type classification of the center
fields.name: center__center_type

fields.description: TCGA codes for the Professional Organization or Group (Center) which has submitted the data, more info: https://gdccancergov/resources-TCGA-users/TCGA-code-tables/center-codes
fields.name: center__code

fields.description: Center name, eg BCM, BI, WUGSC
fields.name: center__name

fields.description: Center abbreviation, eg WUSM
fields.name: center__short_name

fields.description: Timestamp of creation, eg 2016-10-27T21:58:12.297090-05:03
fields.name: created_datetime

fields.description: Category description of the underlying data, eg Clinical, Raw Sequencing Data, Simple Nucleotide Variation, Transcriptome Profiling  , etc
fields.name: data_category

fields.description: File format of the underlying data, eg BCR XML, BAM
fields.name: data_format

fields.description: File format of the underlying data, eg BCR XML, BAM
fields.name: data_type

fields.description: Experimental strategy used to generate data (where applicable) e.g. WXS, RNA-Seq
fields.name: experimental_strategy

fields.description: Name of file at the GDC
fields.name: file_name

fields.description: The size of a file measured in bytes (B), kilobytes (KB), megabytes (MB), gigabytes (GB), terabytes (TB), and larger values.
fields.name: file_size

fields.description: GDC file identifier. This is a duplicate of file_gdc_id field found in some tables.
fields.name: id

fields.description: BAM or VCF index file GDC file UUID
fields.name: index_files__file_id

fields.description: BAM or VCF index file name
fields.name: index_files__file_name

fields.description: BAM  or VCF index file size
fields.name: index_files__file_size

fields.description: Md5sum for GDC data file
fields.name: md5sum

fields.description: One of CGC, GSC, BCR, COM (or null)
fields.name: metadata_files__file_id

fields.description: Semicolon-delimited list of file tags, eg  coverage  , or  hg19;nocnv  , etc
fields.name: metadata_files__file_name

fields.description: GDC file UUID for metadata (eg mage-tab) file
fields.name: metadata_files__file_size

fields.description: Name of GDC metadata file
fields.name: metadata_files__type

fields.description: Platform used to generate this data, eg  Illumina  , or  Affymetrix SNP 6.3
fields.name: platform

fields.description: File state -- either submitted or released
fields.name: state

fields.description: This can be used to identify a corresponding entry in the submitter's records. The GDC requires that submitter_id be unique for each entity within a project: the tuple (combination) of [ project_id, submitter_id ] is a unique key.
fields.name: submitter_id

fields.description: Size of metadata file
fields.name: tags

fields.description: Description of the data, e.g. clinical_supplement, aligned_reads
fields.name: type

fields.description: Timestamp of latest update, eg 2017-03-04T16:37:26.081298-06:00
fields.name: updated_datetime
